history.proof: destruct (le_dec i p) as [Hle | Hnle]. - apply Derive_n_pow_smalli. apply Hle. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: nat
i: nat
x: R

Goal:
Derive_n (fun x : R => x ^ p) i x = (if le_dec i p then INR (fact p) / INR (fact (p - i)) * x ^ (p - i) else 0)

Premises:
Derive_n = fix Derive_n (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R) {struct n} : R := match n with | 0%nat => f x | S n0 => Derive (Derive_n f n0) x end : (R -> R) -> nat -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope R_scope]
fact = fix fact (n : nat) : nat := match n with | 0%nat => 1%nat | S n0 => (S n0 * fact n0)%nat end : nat -> nat Argument scope is [nat_scope]
le_dec : forall n m : nat, {(n <= m)%nat} + {~ (n <= m)%nat}
INR = fix INR (n : nat) : R := match n with | 0%nat => 0 | 1%nat => 1 | S (S _ as n0) => INR n0 + 1 end : nat -> R Argument scope is [nat_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
Derive_n_pow_smalli : forall (i p : nat) (x : R), (i <= p)%nat -> Derive_n (fun x0 : R => x0 ^ p) i x = INR (fact p) / INR (fact (p - i)) * x ^ (p - i)
is_derive_n_pow_smalli : forall (i p : nat) (x : R), (i <= p)%nat -> is_derive_n (fun x0 : R => x0 ^ p) i x (INR (fact p) / INR (fact (p - i)) * x ^ (p - i))
C = fun n p : nat => INR (fact n) / (INR (fact p) * INR (fact (n - p))) : nat -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Reste1 = fun (x y : R) (N : nat) => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l : nat => (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) * x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l)))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l))) (Init.Nat.pred (N - k))) (Init.Nat.pred N) : R -> R -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
Reste_E = fun (x y : R) (N : nat) => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l : nat => / INR (fact (S (l + k))) * x ^ S (l + k) * (/ INR (fact (N - l)) * y ^ (N - l))) (Init.Nat.pred (N - k))) (Init.Nat.pred N) : R -> R -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
Reste2 = fun (x y : R) (N : nat) => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l : nat => (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) * x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l) + 1))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l) + 1)) (Init.Nat.pred (N - k))) (Init.Nat.pred N) : R -> R -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
Taylor_Lagrange : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), x < y -> (forall t : R, x <= t <= y -> forall k : nat, (k <= S n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k t) -> exists zeta : R, x < zeta < y /\ f y = sum_f_R0 (fun m : nat => (y - x) ^ m / INR (fact m) * Derive_n f m x) n + (y - x) ^ S n / INR (fact (S n)) * Derive_n f (S n) zeta
fact_prodSO : forall n : nat, INR (fact n) = prod_f_R0 (fun k : nat => if Nat.eq_dec k 0 then 1 else INR k) n
RfactN_fact2N_factk : forall N k : nat, (k <= 2 * N)%nat -> (INR (fact N))² <= INR (fact (2 * N - k)) * INR (fact k)
derivable_pt_lim_pow : forall (x : R) (n : nat), derivable_pt_lim (fun y : R => y ^ n) x (INR n * x ^ Init.Nat.pred n)
is_derive_pow : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x l : R), is_derive f x l -> is_derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 ^ n) x (INR n * l * f x ^ Init.Nat.pred n)
Rabs = fun r : R => if Rcase_abs r then - r else r : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
Derive_n_coef : forall (a : nat -> R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt 0 (CV_radius a) -> Derive_n (PSeries a) n 0 = a n * INR (fact n)
INR_fact_neq_0 : forall n : nat, INR (fact n) <> 0
PSeries = fun (a : nat -> R) (x : R) => Series.Series (fun k : nat => a k * x ^ k) : (nat -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
sum_f_R0 = fix sum_f_R0 (f : nat -> R) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => f 0%nat | S i => sum_f_R0 f i + f (S i) end : (nat -> R) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope]
Derive = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => real (Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) 0) : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
decomp_sum : forall (An : nat -> R) (N : nat), (0 < N)%nat -> sum_f_R0 An N = An 0%nat + sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => An (S i)) (Init.Nat.pred N)
pow_nonzero : forall (x : R) (n : nat), x <> 0 -> x ^ n <> 0
Derive_n_ext_loc : forall (f g : R_UniformSpace -> R) (n : nat) (x : R_UniformSpace), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => f t = g t) -> Derive_n f n x = Derive_n g n x
derivable_pt_lim_minus : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), derivable_pt_lim f1 x l1 -> derivable_pt_lim f2 x l2 -> derivable_pt_lim (f1 - f2) x (l1 - l2)
Derive_n_comp : forall (f : R -> R) (n m : nat) (x : R), Derive_n (Derive_n f m) n x = Derive_n f (n + m) x
is_derive_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (x k df : R), is_derive f x df -> is_derive (fun x0 : R => k * f x0) x (k * df)
mult_INR : forall n m : nat, INR (n * m) = INR n * INR m
prod_f_R0 = fix prod_f_R0 (f : nat -> R) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => f 0%nat | S p => prod_f_R0 f p * f (S p) end : (nat -> R) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope]
is_derive_n_unique : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x l : R), is_derive_n f n x l -> Derive_n f n x = l
is_derive_id : forall x0 : ?K, is_derive (fun t : ?K => t) x0 one where ?K : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- AbsRing]
get_signZ = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.neg p => Some (Z.pos p) | _ => None end : Z -> option Z Argument scope is [Z_scope]
is_derive_plus : forall (f g : ?K -> ?V) (x0 : ?K) (df dg : ?V), is_derive f x0 df -> is_derive g x0 dg -> is_derive (fun x1 : ?K => plus (f x1) (g x1)) x0 (plus df dg) where ?K : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- AbsRing] ?V : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- NormedModule ?K]
BinNatDef.N.mul = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos q => N.pos (p * q) end end : N -> N -> N Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
filterdiff_mult_fct : forall (f g : ?U -> ?K) (x0 : ?U) (lf lg : ?U -> ?K), (forall n m : ?K, mult n m = mult m n) -> filterdiff f (locally x0) lf -> filterdiff g (locally x0) lg -> filterdiff (fun t : ?U => mult (f t) (g t)) (locally x0) (fun t : ?U => plus (mult (lf t) (g x0)) (mult (f x0) (lg t))) where ?K : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- AbsRing] ?U : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- NormedModule ?K]
fast_Zopp_plus_distr : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (- x + - y)%Z -> P (- (x + y))%Z
locally_filter : forall x0 : ?T, ProperFilter (locally x0) where ?T : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- UniformSpace]
prod_SO_split : forall (An : nat -> R) (n k : nat), (k < n)%nat -> prod_f_R0 An n = prod_f_R0 An k * prod_f_R0 (fun l : nat => An (k + 1 + l)%nat) (n - k - 1)
le_INR : forall n m : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> INR n <= INR m
is_derive_ext : forall (f g : ?K -> ?V) (x0 : ?K) (l : ?V), (forall t : ?K, f t = g t) -> is_derive f x0 l -> is_derive g x0 l where ?K : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- AbsRing] ?V : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- NormedModule ?K]
BinNatDef.N.add = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => m | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => n | N.pos q => N.pos (p + q) end end : N -> N -> N Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
derivable_continuous_pt : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f x -> continuity_pt f x
sum_O : forall a : nat -> ?G, sum_n a 0 = a 0%nat where ?G : [i : nat p : nat x : R |- AbelianGroup]
real = fun x : Rbar => match x with | Finite x0 => x0 | _ => 0 end : Rbar -> R real is a coercion

```coq
destruct (le_dec i p) as [Hle | Hnle].
- apply Derive_n_pow_smalli. apply Hle.
- simpl. rewrite Hnle. reflexivity.
Qed.```
